name: Wiraż
overview: Wiraż is a racing game for four players (human or computer), similar to Supercars II. The objective of the game is to win the race and fit within the time limit. Collisions with the other drivers, side of the road or various obstacles cause significant deceleration of the vehicle. The game features cup mode and arcade mode. Cup mode allows to select one of the twelve available tracks and the number of laps (one to nine). The winner of a single race wins the cup. Arcade mode features four laps races with no possibility to choose the track. Only the winner passes to the next stage and defeat withdraw back to the first track. This means that from the second phase the player races only with the computer drivers.
